marklogic.body:
Funy how the trend in lower jobless claims, and higher employer hires is steady with out any little Hiccups. Just magical how slow but perfect the recovery is. Absolutely perfect in the steady trickle of improvement without a single hitch. Much like our dear leaders perfection.
At this point I do not care what the economy does, the illi gitim ate occupier of the Oval orifice must go. This fall vote like your country Depends on it.....it does....
